name: Concisify
description: Convert PDF to notes and generates a short quiz. Used Flask to access NLP API and React to build the front-end.

name: WikipediaExplorer
description: A web app that allows users to explore Wikipedia articles in a more interactive way. Each branch represents a hyperlink in the article.

name: Tag Search Portfolio
description: A portfolio website that allows users to search for projects by tags.

name: Straights
description: A 4-Player card game that allows users to play against CPUs. Used C++ to implement the game logic and used MVC design pattern to separate the game logic and the UI.

name: Android PDF Editor
description: A feature-rich PDF reader application for Android. Built with kotlin and ❤️

name: Entrance
description: Chat with your favorite streamers! This is a platform for virtual meet and greets that I developed over 2 years. Uses webrtc for voice and video calls.

name: Pokemon Mixer
description: Using the VAE (Variational Autoencoder) model to interpolate pokemon!

name: Class-Agnostic Semantic Edge Detection
description: A deep learning project that performs class-agnostic edge detection using a U-Net architecture and weighted BCE loss on the PASCAL VOC 2012 dataset.
